text: If I am using a Tag field in my module for Marketing to pick tags from the Blog, is there anyway to display only specific tags that contain a specific string pattern, if I wanted to limit the blog tag list?
<@U38EZFVFE>, so can that be used as regex like on the design manager side in the field where the users entering content into module using the drop down tag field?
I see Display Conditions but I cannot choose that specific field I am editing, its only conditions based on other fields, not on the one you are on
